name: Alexi Bracey

what_you_do: Alexi Bracey runs Whole Health Academy and the Whole Health App, offering health coaching, consulting, and online education focused on holistic lifestyle modifications to help people thrive as they age.
who_you_serve: Mature women and caregivers (ages 40, 50, 60+) who want to maintain mental clarity and cognitive function and are concerned about dementia.
offering: Health coaching, consulting, online education, and a mobile app (The Whole Health App) covering emotional, mental, and physical wellness.
social_proof: Two decades of experience in health and wellness; personal cancer survivor who overcame cancer without medical intervention; podcast guest appearances.
signature_programs: Whole Health Academy, The Whole Health App, Discovery Coaching Session (60-minute telephone session)
business_focus: Empowering mature women and caregivers to maintain cognitive health and thrive as they age through holistic lifestyle modifications.
service_provided: health coaching, consulting, online education, mobile app, discovery coaching sessions
